articles.title: Everton keen on loan swoop for Bayern Munich striker Joshua Zirkzee - which could become permanent - Daily Mail
articles.description: He was due to join Frankfurt on a temporary deal but they signed Luka Jovic from Real Madrid this week. Cologne have also enquired, while Everton could make any loan move permanent.
